trans-unit.source: Provides methods to manage the global designer verbs and menu commands available in design mode, and to show some types of shortcut menus.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para gerir os verbos estruturador global e comandos de menu disponíveis no modo de estrutura e para mostrar alguns tipos de menus de atalho.

trans-unit.source: This interface provides methods to: - Find, invoke, add and remove global designer verb commands.
trans-unit.target: Esta interface fornece métodos para: - localize, invocar, adicione e remova os comandos de verbo estruturador global.

trans-unit.source: - Find, invoke, add and remove standard menu commands.
trans-unit.target: -Localizar, invocar, adicione e remova os comandos de menu padrão.

trans-unit.source: - Alter the event handlers associated with standard menu commands.
trans-unit.target: -Altere os processadores de eventos associados comandos de menu padrão.

trans-unit.source: - Display a shortcut menu of standard commands that is associated with a menu <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>.
trans-unit.target: -Apresentar um menu de atalho de comandos padrão que está associado um menu <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: Designer verbs represent custom-defined commands that are listed on the shortcut menu in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Estruturador verbos representam comandos personalizados que estão listados no menu de atalho no modo de estrutura.

trans-unit.source: A designer verb can provide a specified text label.
trans-unit.target: Um verbo estruturador pode fornecer uma etiqueta de texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Each designer verb is automatically assigned a unique <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>.
trans-unit.target: Cada verbo designer é atribuído automaticamente um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> exclusivo

trans-unit.source: A designer can provide designer verbs through its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A> property, but these are only available when the designer's component is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Um designer pode fornecer verbos estruturador através do respetivo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A>propriedade, mas estas só estão disponíveis quando o componente do estruturador atualmente selecionado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Global designer verbs are designer verb commands that can be accessed from a design-mode shortcut menu regardless of the selected component.
trans-unit.target: Verbos estruturador globais são comandos estruturador verbo, que podem ser acedidos a partir de um menu de atalho do modo de estrutura, independentemente do componente selecionado.

trans-unit.source: This interface allows you to manage the set of global designer verbs that are available in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Esta interface permite-lhe gerir o conjunto de verbos estruturador global que estão disponíveis no modo de estrutura.

trans-unit.source: You can add a global designer verb using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> method, and you can remove a global designer verb using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveVerb%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar um verbo estruturador global utilizando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>método e pode remover um verbo estruturador global utilizando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveVerb%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveVerb%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can invoke a designer verb using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.GlobalInvoke%2A> method if you know the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> of the verb.
trans-unit.target: Pode invocar um verbo estruturador utilizando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.GlobalInvoke%2A>método se souber o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>do verbo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.GlobalInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.Verbs%2A> property of this interface contains the current set of designer verb commands to display in a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.Verbs%2A>propriedade desta interface contém o conjunto atual de comandos de verbo estruturador para apresentar um menu de atalho.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: This set of designer verb commands consists of all global designer verbs and any designer verbs offered by the designer of any currently selected component.
trans-unit.target: Este conjunto de comandos de verbo designer é composta por todos os verbos estruturador global e qualquer verbos estruturador oferecidos pelo designer de qualquer componente atualmente selecionada.

trans-unit.source: This set of verbs is updated each time a component with a designer offering designer verb commands is selected or deselected.
trans-unit.target: Este conjunto de verbos é atualizado sempre que um componente com um designer oferta comandos verbo estruturador é seleccionado ou desmarcado.

trans-unit.source: Menu commands are limited to the set of predefined standard commands.
trans-unit.target: Comandos de menu estão limitados ao conjunto de comandos padrão predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: Most of the predefined standard commands are defined in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands> enumerations.
trans-unit.target: A maioria dos comandos padrão predefinidas está definida no <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands>enumerações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands>

trans-unit.source: You can add, remove, and invoke menu commands, and search for menu commands that have been added to a menu using methods of this interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar, remover, invocar comandos de menu e procure comandos de menu que foram adicionados ao menu através de métodos desta interface.

trans-unit.source: You can add a standard menu command using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A> method, and remove a standard menu command using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveCommand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar um comando de standard menu utilizando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A>método e remove um comando de standard menu utilizando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveCommand%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveCommand%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can attach an event handler to a predefined standard menu command by following the procedure detailed in the documentation for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode anexar um processador de eventos para um comando de menu padrão predefinidas, seguindo o procedimento descrito na documentação para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve a menu command by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> if it has been added to a menu using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode obter um comando de menu por <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>se foi adicionado num menu, utilizando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: You can invoke a menu command or designer verb command by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.GlobalInvoke%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode invocar um comando de menu ou comando verbo estruturador por <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>utilizando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.GlobalInvoke%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.GlobalInvoke%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An attempt to add a menu command with an already existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Uma tentativa de adicionar um comando de menu com um já existente <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>irá gerar um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: When adding a menu command, be sure to check that it is not already on a menu using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> method, or use exception handling wisely.
trans-unit.target: Ao adicionar um comando de menu, não se esqueça de verificar que ainda não estiver no menu a utilizar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>método ou utilize excepção a processar a forma sensata.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A menu command can be added to a menu, and have its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A> properties set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um comando de menu podem ser adicionados a um menu e tem o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A>ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A>as propriedades definidas como `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot visually locate a menu command that has been added on a menu, one of these properties may have been set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se visualmente não é possível localizar um comando de menu que tenha sido adicionado um menu, uma destas propriedades poderá ter sido definida como `false`.

trans-unit.source: You can show certain standard shortcut menus containing menu commands at a specified location using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.ShowContextMenu%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode mostrar determinados menus de atalho padrão que contém os comandos de menu numa localização especificada utilizando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.ShowContextMenu%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.ShowContextMenu%2A>

trans-unit.source: The documentation for this method contains a table listing the command IDs that specify the valid menus to show.
trans-unit.target: A documentação para que este método contém uma tabela que lista os IDs de comandos que especificam os menus válidos para mostrar.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified standard menu command to the menu.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona os comandos de menu padrão especificado ao menu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands> enumerations contain <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> identifiers for predefined standard commands and menu commands that are already associated with a location on a particular menu.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands>enumerações contenham <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>identificadores para predefinidas comandos padrão e comandos de menu que já estão associados a uma localização no menu específico.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An attempt to add a menu command with an already existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Uma tentativa de adicionar um comando de menu com um já existente <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>irá gerar um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: When adding a menu command, be sure to check that it is not already on a menu using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> method, or use exception handling wisely.
trans-unit.target: Ao adicionar um comando de menu, não se esqueça de verificar que ainda não estiver no menu a utilizar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>método ou utilize excepção a processar a forma sensata.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can attach an event handler to a predefined menu command with the following procedure: 1.
trans-unit.target: Pode anexar um processador de eventos para um comando de menu predefinida com o seguinte procedimento: 1.

trans-unit.source: If the menu command to link with an event handler has been added to a menu, or is located with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> method, consider whether you wish to restore this menu command later, and whether you want to invoke the current event handler from your new event handler.
trans-unit.target: Se o comando de menu para ligar com um processador de eventos foi adicionado a um menu ou encontra-se com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>método, considere se pretende restaurar este comando de menu mais tarde, e se pretende invocar o processador de eventos atual do processador de eventos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your code might restore the menu command or chain the invocation of event handlers, be sure to store a reference to the menu command somewhere.
trans-unit.target: Se o seu código poderá restaurar o comando de menu ou a cadeia a invocação de processadores de eventos, lembre-se de que armazenar uma referência para o comando de menu algures.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that any previously existing menu command with the same <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> has been removed from the menu using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveCommand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que qualquer comando de menu anteriormente existente com o mesmo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>foi removido do menu com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveCommand%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.RemoveCommand%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> and specify your event handler in the constructor, along with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> representing the command to add.
trans-unit.target: Criar um novo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>e especifique o processador de eventos no construtor, juntamente com um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>que representa o comando a adicionar.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>

trans-unit.source: Each standard menu command is associated with a predefined menu location where it is added to.
trans-unit.target: Cada comando de menu padrão está associado uma localização de menu predefinido em que é adicionado à.

trans-unit.source: The supported command IDs are defined in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands> enumerations.
trans-unit.target: Os IDs de comandos suportados são definidos no <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands>enumerações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands>

trans-unit.source: If you want to invoke any preexisting event handler for the menu command, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A> method of the menu command you have replaced on the menu from the event handler that handles the invoke event of your menu command.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender invocar qualquer pré-existentes processador de eventos para o comando de menu, chame o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A>método do comando de menu substituiu com no menu do processador de eventos que processa o evento de invocação do comando de menu.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you are interested in restoring the event handler of a preexisting menu command that you have replaced, add the stored, preexisting menu command after you remove the replacement menu command you created.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver interessado em restaurar o processador de eventos de um comando de menu pré-existentes que substituiu com, adicione o armazenado, pré-existentes comandos de menu depois de remover o comando de menu de substituição que criou.

trans-unit.source: You may want to add this behavior to the `Dispose` method for your type.
trans-unit.target: Pretende adicionar este comportamento para o `Dispose` método para o seu tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> is already present on a menu.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"> </xref> de especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> já está presente no menu.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified designer verb to the set of global designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o verbo estruturador especificado para o conjunto de verbos estruturador global.

trans-unit.source: Designers of components that provide designer verbs should use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A> property of their designer rather than calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Os estruturadores dos componentes que fornecem verbos estruturador devem utilizar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A>propriedade dos respetivos designer em vez de chamar este método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a global designer verb that can be accessed from the right-click shortcut menu in design mode regardless of the currently selected component.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona um verbo estruturador global que pode ser acedido a partir do menu de atalho de contexto no modo de estrutura, independentemente do componente atualmente selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified command ID and returns the menu command associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Pesquisa para o ID do comando especificado e devolve o comando de menu associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"> </xref> para procurar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> associated with the command ID, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no command is found.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> associadas ao ID de comando ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> não se for encontrado nenhum comando.

trans-unit.source: Invokes a menu or designer verb command matching the specified command ID.
trans-unit.target: Invoca um comando de verbo menu ou designer correspondente o ID do comando especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method searches for a menu command or designer verb with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> matching the specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>.
trans-unit.target: Este método de pesquisa para um comando de menu ou o verbo estruturador com uma <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>correspondência <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> especificado</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: This method first searches within the designer verbs collection consisting of global and active designer-provided verbs before continuing the search, if necessary, through the global environment command service.
trans-unit.target: Este método de procura, primeiro, dentro da coleção de verbos estruturador constituídas por verbos designer fornecidos pelo globais e Active Directory antes de continuar a pesquisa, se necessário, através do serviço de comando de ambiente global.

trans-unit.source: If a matching menu command or designer verb is located, the command is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Se um comando de menu correspondente ou o verbo estruturador está localizado, o comando é invocado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> of the command to search for and execute.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"> </xref> do comando para procurar e executar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the command was found and invoked successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o comando foi encontrado e invocado com sucesso; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified standard menu command from the menu.
trans-unit.target: Remove o comando de menu padrão especificado no menu.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> if it is found.
trans-unit.target: Este método Remove especificado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>se for encontrado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>

trans-unit.source: This method does not raise an exception or return a value if the specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> is not found.
trans-unit.target: Este método não gerar uma exceção ou devolver um valor se especificado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>não foi encontrado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> matching a specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> is located on a menu.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>método para determinar se um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>correspondente a uma determinada <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>está localizado no menu.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> para remover.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified designer verb from the collection of global designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: Remove o verbo especificado designer da coleção de verbos estruturador global.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the specified global designer verb if it is within the global designer verbs collection.
trans-unit.target: Este método Remove o verbo especificado de estruturador global, se estiver dentro da coleção de verbos estruturador global.

trans-unit.source: You can add a designer verb to the global designer verbs collection using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar um verbo estruturador para a coleção de verbos estruturador global utilizando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"> </xref> para remover.

trans-unit.source: Shows the specified shortcut menu at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Mostra o menu de atalho especificado na localização especificada.

trans-unit.source: The ShowContextMenu method can display any of the following Visual Studio shortcut menus containing menu commands at a specified point: |Menu|CommandID| |----------|---------------| |The shortcut menu displayed for a container|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.ContainerMenu>| |The shortcut menu displayed for the component tray|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.ComponentTrayMenu>| |The shortcut menu displayed for a selection|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.SelectionMenu>| |The shortcut menu displayed for a tray selection|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.TraySelectionMenu>| This method can also display other registered shortcut menus.
trans-unit.target: O método ShowContextMenu pode apresentar qualquer um dos seguintes menus de atalho de Visual Studio, que contém os comandos de menu num ponto especificado: | Menu | CommandID | |----------|---------------| | O menu de atalho apresentado para um contentor | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.ContainerMenu>| | O menu de atalho apresentado no tabuleiro do componente | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.ComponentTrayMenu>| | O menu de atalho apresentado para uma seleção | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.SelectionMenu>| | O menu de atalho apresentado para uma seleção de tabuleiro | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.TraySelectionMenu>| Este método também pode apresentar outros menus de atalho registado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.TraySelectionMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.SelectionMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.ComponentTrayMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MenuCommands.ContainerMenu>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> for the shortcut menu to show.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"> </xref> para o menu de atalho a mostrar.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate at which to display the menu, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x a que a apresentar no menu, em coordenadas do ecrã.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate at which to display the menu, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y em que a apresentar no menu, em coordenadas do ecrã.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the designer verbs that are currently available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção dos verbos estruturador que estão atualmente disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: The set of currently available designer verbs consists of all global designer verbs, which are added by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> method on this interface, and individual designer verbs, which are offered by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A> property of individual designers.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de verbos estruturador atualmente disponíveis é composta por todos os global estruturador verbos, que são adicionados através do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>método nesta interface e verbos estruturador individuais, que são oferecidos pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A>propriedade dos designers individuais.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the name of a global verb conflicts with the name of a designer verb, the designer-provided designer verb takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se o nome de um verbo global está em conflito com o nome de um verbo estruturador, o verbo designer fornecidos pelo estruturador tem precedência.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection"></xref> that contains the designer verbs that are currently available.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection"> </xref> que contém os verbos estruturador que estão atualmente disponíveis.
